question: A shirt costs $20.00 and is discounted by 25%. If you have a 10% off coupon that applies after the initial discount, what is the final price?
If the decimal 0.625 is expressed as a simplified fraction <sup>x</sup>⁄<sub>y</sub> in its simplest form, what is x+y?
In a class of 200 students, 120 students scored above 75% in their final exams. What fraction of the class did not achieve this score?

Here are some numbers: 0.32, 0.45, 0.21, 0.54, 0.41, 0.27, 0.38. Adam arranges all the numbers in a line, so that the numbers increase from left to right. Which number appears in the middle of the sequence?
Which of these statements is/are correct?
What is the value of 0.75 added to the fraction equivalent of 37.5% and then multiplied by 2?
Which of these numbers is closest to <sup>3</sup>⁄<sub>5</sub>?
In a class of 40 students, 60% are boys. During a test, 25% of the boys and 40% of the girls scored above 90%. What percentage of the total students scored above 90%?
To prepare a certain dish, you need to use 5 parts rice and 3 parts vegetables. What percentage of the mixture consists of rice, and what percentage consists of vegetables?
The sum of two fractions is <sup>3</sup>⁄<sub>5</sub>. If one of the fractions is <sup>7</sup>⁄<sub>12</sub>, what is the difference between the two fractions?
